thread.title: A Child’s Weekly Allocation: Spend, Save and Give

author: wsjcom
title: A Child’s Weekly Allocation: Spend, Save and Give
text:
For Kellan Yeager, Sunday night means four quarters, three Mason jars—and now, one Lego truck set.
Over the summer, the 6-year-old kindergartner at Oakhurst Elementary School in Decatur, Ga., began showing more interest in what things cost. “He started looking at price tags and asking what those price tags meant,” says his mother, Jennifer... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
